description: 3 month priority works as per the recent tree survey report dated 25th October 2024:0108 Common Oak - Fell to safe height.0115, 0134, 0366, 0528 Ash x4 - Fell to safe height.0127 Sycamore - Fell to safe height.0140, 0397 Common Oak x2 - Remove major deadwood.0365 Sycamore - Fell to ground level.0367, 0380 Goat Willow x2 - Fell to ground level.0379, 0382, 0383, 0392, 0398, 0399 Ash x6 - Fell to ground level.0384, 0393 Corsican Pine x2 - Remove major deadwood.0394 Mixed species - Fell to ground level.0395 Ash - Fell to safe height.0396 Common Ash - Reduce faulted limb by 4m.0376 Whitebeam - Fell to safe height.0378 Common Beech - Reduce faulted limb by 3m.0387 Common Hazel - Coppice to 0.5m stumps.0389 Common Ash - Fell to ground level.0391 Common Ash - Fell to safe height.SUBJECT TO TPO 95 (28.9.1973)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
